title: Passive Voice With Prepositions - 2
instructions: Rewrite the sentences. Put them into B1Passive VoiceB2. Keep the tenses and pay attention to the B1prepositionsB2.
exa:
They will ask about you.
You will be asked about by them.
They didn't care about this building.
This building was not cared about.

contents.longsent: They won't put up with this noise.
alters: This noise won't be put up with.

contents.longsent: Your work mates don't look down on you.
alters: looked down on by your work mates.

contents.longsent: They didn't approve of our plan.
Why did they expel you from your school?
Did they insure you against earthquakes?
They won't wait for the results.
alters: The results won't be waited for
The results will not be waited for.

contents.longsent: Your workers don't listen to you.
alters: You are not listened to by your workers.

contents.longsent: The authorities didn't warn the inhabitants against the storm.
